(also rotative) (of a machine) having a part that moves around in a circle: a rotary engine The device is driven by a rotary hydraulic actuator. This rotative engine had an important effect on the mechanization of factories.
A rotary washing line is a piece of equipment used for drying clothes on outside that consists of a pole and a frame that spins around: Dry clothes outdoors on a washing line or rotary dryer. Rotary washing lines are a superb alternative to a traditional washing line.
